00127 void testRDD(){

00129     long        n                                       = 5;
00130     float       r_m[]                           = {1e-6, 1e-7, 1e-8, 1e-9, 1e-10};
00131 
00132     float       E_MeV_u                         = 100;
00133     long        particle_no                     = 1;
00134     long        material_no                     = 2;
00135 
00136     long        rdd_model                       = 1;
00137         long    n_rdd_parameter         = 0;
00138     float       rdd_parameter[]         = {1e-11f, 1e-11f, 0.0f};
00139 
00140         long    er_model                        = 2;
00141         long    n_er_parameter          = 0;
00142     float       er_parameter            = 0.0f;
00143 
00144     float       D_RDD_Gy[]                      = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00145         float   r_RDD_m_back[]          = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00146 
00147         int i;
00148 
00149         printf("begin model %d\n", rdd_model);
00150         SGP_D_RDD_Gy(   &n,
00151                                         r_m,
00152                                         &E_MeV_u,       &particle_no,           &material_no,
00153                                         &rdd_model, &n_rdd_parameter,   rdd_parameter,
00154                                         &er_model,      &n_er_parameter,        &er_parameter,
00155                                         D_RDD_Gy);
00156 
00157         for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
00158                 printf("end, D_RRD_Gy[%g] = %g, r_RRD_m_back = %g\n", r_m[i], D_RDD_Gy[i], r_RDD_m_back[i]);}
00159 
00160         rdd_model                       = 2;
00161         n_rdd_parameter         = 2;
00162         printf("begin model %d\n", rdd_model);
00163         SGP_D_RDD_Gy(   &n,
00164                                         r_m,
00165                                         &E_MeV_u,       &particle_no,           &material_no,
00166                                         &rdd_model, &n_rdd_parameter,   rdd_parameter,
00167                                         &er_model,      &n_er_parameter,        &er_parameter,
00168                                         D_RDD_Gy);
00169         for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
00170                 printf("end, D_RRD_Gy[%g] = %g, r_RRD_m_back = %g\n", r_m[i], D_RDD_Gy[i], r_RDD_m_back[i]);}
00171 
00172         rdd_model                       = 3;
00173         n_rdd_parameter         = 1;
00174         rdd_parameter[0]        = 5e-8;
00175         printf("begin model %d\n", rdd_model);
00176         SGP_D_RDD_Gy(   &n,
00177                                         r_m,
00178                                         &E_MeV_u,       &particle_no,           &material_no,
00179                                         &rdd_model, &n_rdd_parameter,   rdd_parameter,

00181                                         D_RDD_Gy);

00184         }
00185

00187         n_rdd_parameter         = 2;

00190         printf("begin model %d\n", rdd_model);

00193                                         &E_MeV_u,       &particle_no,           &material_no,

00199         }
00200 
00201         rdd_model                       = 5;
00202         n_rdd_parameter         = 3;
00203         rdd_parameter[0]        = 1e-11;
00204         rdd_parameter[1]        = 5e-8;
00205         rdd_parameter[2]        = 1e-11;
00206         printf("begin model %d\n", rdd_model);
00207         SGP_D_RDD_Gy(   &n,
00208                                         r_m,
00209                                         &E_MeV_u,       &particle_no,           &material_no,
00210                                         &rdd_model, &n_rdd_parameter,   rdd_parameter,
00211                                         &er_model,      &n_er_parameter,        &er_parameter,
00212                                         D_RDD_Gy);
00213         for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
00214                 printf("end, D_RRD_Gy[%g] = %g, r_RRD_m_back = %g\n", r_m[i], D_RDD_Gy[i], r_RDD_m_back[i]);
00215         }
00216 
00217         n                                               = 1;
00218         float   p_E_MeV_u[]             = {100}; //{100, 10, 1};
00219         long    p_particle_no[] = {1}; //{1, 1, 1};
00220         rdd_model                               = 4;
00221     float       rdd_parameter2[]= {5e-8f, 1e-11f};
00222     n_rdd_parameter                     = 2;
00223         long    N2                              = 10;
00224         bool    debug                   = false;
00225         long    n_bins_f1;
00226         float*  f1_parameters   = (float*)calloc(n * 9, sizeof(float));
00227 
00228         SGP_SC_get_f1_array_size(       /* radiation field parameters */
00229                                                                 &n,
00230                                                                 p_E_MeV_u,
00231                                                                 p_particle_no,
00232                                                                 /* detector parameters */
00233                                                                 &material_no,
00234                                                                 &rdd_model,
00235                                                                 &n_rdd_parameter,
00236                                                                 &rdd_parameter2,
00237                                                                 /* electron range model */
00238                                                                 &er_model,
00239                                                                 &n_er_parameter,
00240                                                                 &er_parameter,
00241                                                                 /* algorith parameters*/
00242                                                                 &N2,
00243                                                                 &debug,
00244                                                                 // from here: return values
00245                                                                 &n_bins_f1,
00246                                                                 f1_parameters);
00247 
00248         float   p_fluence_cm2[]                 =       {1e8}; //{1e8, 1e8, 1e8};
00249         float*  norm_fluence                    =       (float*)calloc(n, sizeof(float));
00250         float*  dose_contribution_Gy    =       (float*)calloc(n, sizeof(float));
00251         float*  f_parameters                    =       (float*)calloc(7, sizeof(float));
00252         float*  f1_d_Gy                                 =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00253         float*  f1_dd_Gy                                =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00254         float*  f1                                              =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00255 
00256         SGP_SC_get_f1(  /* radiation field parameters */
00257                                                         &n,
00258                                                         p_E_MeV_u,
00259                                                         p_particle_no,
00260                                                         p_fluence_cm2,
00261                                                         /* detector parameters */
00262                                                         &material_no,
00263                                                         &rdd_model,
00264                                                         &n_rdd_parameter,
00265                                                         &rdd_parameter,
00266                                                         /* electron range model */
00267                                                         &er_model,
00268                                                         &n_er_parameter,
00269                                                         &er_parameter,
00270                                                         /* algorith parameters*/
00271                                                         &N2,
00272                                                         &n_bins_f1,
00273                                                         /* f1 parameters*/
00274                                                         f1_parameters,
00275                                                         // from here: return values
00276                                                         norm_fluence,
00277                                                         dose_contribution_Gy,
00278                                                         f_parameters,
00279                                                         f1_d_Gy,
00280                                                         f1_dd_Gy,
00281                                                         f1);
00282 
00283         float   fluence_factor = 1.0f;
00284         long    n_bins_f;
00285         float   u_start;
00286         long    n_convolutions;
00287         SGP_SC_get_f_array_size(        &f_parameters[0],
00288                         &fluence_factor,
00289                         &N2,
00290                         &n_bins_f1,
00291                         f1_d_Gy,
00292                         f1_dd_Gy,
00293                         f1,
00294                         // from here: return values
00295                         &n_bins_f,
00296                         &u_start,
00297                         &n_convolutions);
00298 
00299         float*  f_d_Gy                                  =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00300         float*  f_dd_Gy                                 =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00301         float*  f_start                                 =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00302 
00303         SGP_SC_get_f_start(     &f_parameters[0],
00304                         &n_bins_f1,
00305                         &N2,
00306                         f1_d_Gy,
00307                         f1_dd_Gy,
00308                         f1,
00309                         &n_bins_f,
00310                         // from here: return values
00311                         f_d_Gy,
00312                         f_dd_Gy,
00313                         f_start);
00314 
00315         bool    write_output = true;
00316         bool    shrink_tails                    = true;
00317         float   shrink_tails_under              = 1e-30f;
00318         bool    adjust_N2                               = true;
00319         long    n_bins_f_used                   = n_bins_f;
00320 
00321         float   f0;
00322         float*  fdd                                             =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00323         float*  dfdd                                    =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00324         float   d;
00325 
00326         SGP_SuccessiveConvolutions(     &f_parameters[0],
00327                         &n_bins_f,
00328                         &N2,
00329                         // input + return values
00330                         &n_bins_f_used,
00331                         f_d_Gy,
00332                         f_dd_Gy,
00333                         f_start,
00334                         // return values
00335                         &f0,
00336                         fdd,
00337                         dfdd,
00338                         &d,
00339                         &write_output,
00340                         &shrink_tails,
00341                         &shrink_tails_under,
00342                         &adjust_N2);
00343 
00344 
00345         free(f1_parameters);
00346         free(norm_fluence);
00347         free(dose_contribution_Gy);
00348         free(f_parameters);
00349         free(f1_d_Gy);
00350         free(f1_dd_Gy);
00351         free(f1);
00352         free(f_d_Gy);
00353         free(f_dd_Gy);
00354         free(f_start);
00355         free(fdd);
00356         free(dfdd);
00357 }
